name: soft-sand
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Ground moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Ground-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.
